court: IN THE PUNJAB AND HARYANA HIGH COURT AT CHANDIGARH CWP No. 3314 of 1987 (O&M) Gurcharan Singh and others ...Petitioners vs The Managing Director and others ..Respondents Coram: Hon'ble Mr. Justice Rajesh Bindal Present: Mr. Ravi Kapur, Advocate, for the petitioners. Mr. D. S. Patwalia, Advocate, for the respondents. Rajesh Bindal, J. Learned counsel for the petitioners submitted that the claim made by the petitioners in the present writ petition is squarely covered by judgment of this court in K. L. Arora and others vs Registrar, Cooperative Societies, Punjab and others 2009 (4) RSJ 735. On the other hand, learned counsel for the respondents concedes the prayer made by the petitioners only to the extent it has been granted to the petitioners in K. L. Arora's case (supra). In view of the aforesaid stand of the parties, the present writ petition is disposed of in terms of the judgment of this court in K. L. Arora's case (supra). .3.2011 (Rajesh Bindal) vs

judgment_text:
IN THE PUNJAB AND HARYANA HIGH COURT AT CHANDIGARH CWP No. 3314 of 1987 (O&M) Gurcharan Singh and others ...Petitioners vs The Managing Director and others ..Respondents Coram: Hon'ble Mr. Justice Rajesh Bindal Present: Mr. Ravi Kapur, Advocate, for the petitioners. Mr. D. S. Patwalia, Advocate, for the respondents. Rajesh Bindal, J. Learned counsel for the petitioners submitted that the claim made by the petitioners in the present writ petition is squarely covered by judgment of this court in K. L. Arora and others vs Registrar, Cooperative Societies, Punjab and others 2009 (4) RSJ 735. On the other hand, learned counsel for the respondents concedes the prayer made by the petitioners only to the extent it has been granted to the petitioners in K. L. Arora's case (supra). In view of the aforesaid stand of the parties, the present writ petition is disposed of in terms of the judgment of this court in K. L. Arora's case (supra). .3.2011 (Rajesh Bindal) vs

Judge
